comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Does not understand any standard language. Works with the "foo2zjs" and "pbmtozjs" drivers. The "foo2zjs" driver is derived from the "pbmtozjs" driver and supports more paper sizes and options.

PCL is only implemented in the Windows driver, to support DOS applications in the DOS box of Windows.

The printer is faster than the LaserJet 1000 and has both USB and parallel connection. As the LaserJet 1000, it has only 1 MB of RAMand 32 kB of ROM.

The firmware of the printer must be uploaded after turning it on. Note that you cannot simply upload it by commands like "cat sihp1005.img > /dev/usb/lp0". The "foo2zjs" driver package contains a script to do the upload.
